content: उपलब्धिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Getting, obtaining, acquisition; वृथा हि मे स्यात्स्वपदोपलब्धिः <ls>R. 5. 56</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 17.</ls> {@--2@} Observation, perception, knowledge (ज्ञान); नाभाव उपलब्धेः <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Nyāya S. 2. 28</ls>, <ls n="Nyāya S. 2.">30.</ls> {@--3@} Understanding, mind (मति). {@--4@} A conjecture, guess. {@--5@} Perceptibility, appearance (recognized as a kind of proof by the Mīmāṃsakas); see अनुपलब्धि.
